channel.title: Mastodon on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mastodon on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Brent Hinds, Mastodon Co-Founder, Dies at 51 Following Motorcycle Accident
item.description: “We are heartbroken, shocked and still trying to process the loss of this creative force,” Mastodon said in a statement.
